text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Relax. The birther lady is likely talking about the White House where everyone who comes into contact with Trump is tested (including oil execs), and where they ordered masks for staff even as they were telling the public masks were unnecessary. https://t.co/L3ZlvH19Mq
